basic_info.summary:
I am looking to transition into the tech world. I have always been fascinated by computers and programming. After a couple of years in the accounting industry, I decided it was time to 
make the jump and dive into programming full-time.

experiences.details:
Maintained and reconciled all general ledger accounts. Prepared and recorded monthly closing entries. Prepared and recorded journal entries by compiling, analyzing, and substantiating financial transactions as needed.
Prepared and recorded monthly intercompany elimination entries and adjustments for various bank subsidiaries. Performed ad hoc analysis as required by management. Assisted with compliance requirements including taxes and audits. 
Assisted wth analyzing financial statements on a monthly basis and reporting on variances.

experiences.company: Morrison, Brown, Argiz & Farra, LLC - Miami, Florida
experiences.details:
Performed comprehensive financial audits of public and privately-held entities across the banking, broker-dealer, not-for-profit, bio-medical, video production, and healthcare industries.

to their adherence to the Bank Secrecy Act and its implementing regulations, the Anti Money Laundering rules.
